## Matrix4.computePerspectiveFieldOfView() method

Computes a Matrix4 instance representing a perspective transformation matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static computePerspectiveFieldOfView(fovY: number, aspectRatio: number, near: number, far: number, result?: Matrix4): Matrix4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fovY | number | The field of view along the Y axis in radians. |
|  aspectRatio | number | The aspect ratio. |
|  near | number | The distance to the near plane in meters. |
|  far | number | The distance to the far plane in meters. |
|  result | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | _(Optional)_ The object in which the result will be stored. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md)

The modified result parameter.

## Exceptions

[DeveloperError](./toygl.developererror.md) fovY must be in (0, PI\].

[DeveloperError](./toygl.developererror.md) aspectRatio must be greater than zero.

[DeveloperError](./toygl.developererror.md) near must be greater than zero.

[DeveloperError](./toygl.developererror.md) far must be greater than zero.
